Text.val: Author: Asaf Kehati
Creation date: 25.02.2011
13.12.2012 SH SCR17799 Removed GB723 WinTerminateLines (was never called) and changed expressions used for FileExist() function
directroy was missing
28.11.2012 SH SCR17738 Changed back sevaral virtuals (SQL output parameters) back to Alpha becasue of cast to char in DSQL
25.10.2012 SH SCR17528 Added GB324 to change encoding of outgoing files; SCR17533 Replaced FileSize()>0 checks by
FileExist() function
09.05.2012 GB SCR17320 Changed calculation for AMTCRD_CUR(Authorized) - added *100
02.02.2012 JH SCR17096 Task Select data if column CLNT403_MAXFINANCEARRANGPERC is empty use CLNT420_INTERNAL_LIMIT
10.10.2011 SH SCR16795 Removed the 3 constraints on the date parameter (pi.DATE)
19.08.2011 AK SCR16694 filled column 'FRMJUR_MOR' with CLNT902_COMPANYTYPECODE
13.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Removed GNRL_CURRENCY (was not used)
Attention!!! the term Debtor in "CK02" equivalent to Client in "Factorlink"
when pi.Date is empty using v.AlterDate
if the parameters are empty (as normal) the date and the type report are
determined by de calender table
set Windows/AS400 working variables

STP.TXT: GENERAL DIRECTORY *** 91 *** IS NOT DEFINED: FILE CAN NOT BE CREATED

Text.val: 'single debtor file'
Copy file from working directory to target directory
'credit file'

STP.TXT: CK02 FILES ARE CREATED ONLY ON SECOND WEEKLY JOB OF THE MONTH AND ON THE MONTHLY JOB

SQL_STMT_U.val:
Select --(1)"NUMBCK_DBT" --############### CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO as "NUMBCK_DBT",
--(2)"NUMENT_BEL" --############### CLIC908_ID as "NUMENT_BEL",
--(4)"DEBTYP" --############### cast('2' as char(1)) as "DEBTYP",
--(9)"DENOFF_MOR" --############### cast(trim(trim(CLNT.CLNT110_NAME1) || trim(CLNT.CLNT110_NAME2)) as char(80)) as "DENOFF_MOR",
--(10)"FRMJUR_MOR" if empty default value is 014 --############### case when repeat('0',3-length(trim(CLNT902_COMPANYTYPECODE)))|| trim(CLNT902_COMPANYTYPECODE)='000' then cast('014' as char(3)) else cast(repeat('0',3-length(trim(CLNT902_COMPANYTYPECODE)))|| trim(CLNT902_COMPANYTYPECODE) as char(3)) end as "FRMJUR_MOR",
--(11)"CURADR_STR" --############### CLNT111_ADR as "CURADR_STR",
--(14)"CURADR_PTT" --############### CLNT.CLNT112_ZIP as "CURADR_PTT",
--(16)"CURADR_CRY" Right now (02/2011) with the current CK02 specification will always be 'BE' --############### CLNT.CLNT114_COUNTRY as "CURADR_CRY",
--(20)"PRBDFT" --############### cast(COALESCE(RISK_PDPERC,0)*100 as integer ) as "PRBDFT",
--(21)"PRBDFT_PRC" --############### cast('3' as char(1)) as "PRBDFT_PRC",
--(22)"COLAMT" A negative collateral will be replaced with zero --############### case when ( select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALDEBTORS)*100 as decimal(13,0)) from :1/CMON join :1/CLNT CLNTINVST on CMON_ADMNO=CLNTINVST.CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO=CLNTINVST.CLNT102_CLNTNO where CLNTINVST.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO=CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO and CLNTINVST.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO=CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO and CMON_YEAR=:2 and CMON_MONTH=:3 and CMON_CURRENCY=CLNT.CLNT108_ACC_CURR ) >0 then ( select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALDEBTORS)*100 as decimal(13,0)) from :1/CMON join :1/CLNT CLNTINVST on CMON_ADMNO=CLNTINVST.CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO=CLNTINVST.CLNT102_CLNTNO where CLNTINVST.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO=CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO and CLNTINVST.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO=CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO and CMON_YEAR=:2 and CMON_MONTH=:3 and CMON_CURRENCY=CLNT.CLNT108_ACC_CURR ) else cast('0' as decimal(13,0)) end as "COLAMT",
--(23)"COLAMT_PRC" --############### cast('2' as char(1)) as "COLAMT_PRC",
--(40)"HDQADR_CRY" This is temporary value!!! When available should be replace later with a database value --############### cast('' as char(2)) as "HDQADR_CRY",
--(45)"CRDMOD_CCR" --############### cast ( case when ( select distinct CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK from :1/CCRY join :1/CLNT CLNTDRISK on CCRY308_ADMNO=CLNTDRISK.CLNT101_ADMNO and CCRY308_CLNTNO=CLNTDRISK.CLNT102_CLNTNO where CLNTDRISK.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO=CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO and CLNTDRISK.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO=CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO and CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK='Y' ) is null then '91' else '92' end as char(2) ) as "CRDMOD_CCR",
--(47)"CODCUR" --############### CLNT.CLNT108_ACC_CURR as "CODCUR",
--(48)"CODCRY_BRH" will always be 'BE'(COMFIN BE has only one branch/office credit is always granted in Belgium ) --############### cast ('BE' as char(2)) as "CODCRY_BRH",
--(49)"STRDAT" --############### case when SECR_DATE_RELEASE_SD is null then cast ( trim(year(CLNT209_CONTRACT_START))|| case when length(trim(month(CLNT209_CONTRACT_START)))=1 then concat('0',trim(month(CLNT209_CONTRACT_START))) else trim(month(CLNT209_CONTRACT_START)) end || case when length(trim(day(CLNT209_CONTRACT_START)))=1 then concat('0',trim(day(CLNT209_CONTRACT_START))) else trim(day(CLNT209_CONTRACT_START)) end as char(8) ) else cast ( trim(year(SECR_DATE_RELEASE_SD))|| case when length(trim(month(SECR_DATE_RELEASE_SD)))=1 then concat('0',trim(month(SECR_DATE_RELEASE_SD))) else trim(month(SECR_DATE_RELEASE_SD)) end || case when length(trim(day(SECR_DATE_RELEASE_SD)))=1 then concat('0',trim(day(SECR_DATE_RELEASE_SD))) else trim(day(SECR_DATE_RELEASE_SD)) end as char(8) ) end as "STRDAT",
--(50)"ENDDAT(Authorized)" --############### cast ( trim(year(CLNT.CLNT209_CONTRACT_END))|| case when length(trim(month(CLNT.CLNT209_CONTRACT_END)))=1 then concat('0',trim(month(CLNT.CLNT209_CONTRACT_END))) else trim(month(CLNT.CLNT209_CONTRACT_END)) end || case when length(trim(day(CLNT.CLNT209_CONTRACT_END)))=1 then concat('0',trim(day(CLNT.CLNT209_CONTRACT_END))) else trim(day(CLNT.CLNT209_CONTRACT_END)) end as char(8) ) as "ENDDAT(Authorized)",
--(51)"ENDDAT(Used)" For factoring companies used credit has no end date --############### cast('00000000' as char(8)) as "ENDDAT(Used)",
--(52)"AMTCRD_CUR(Authorized)" --############### case when CLNT403_MAXFINANCETOTAL<>0 then cast(CLNT403_MAXFINANCETOTAL*100 as decimal(13,0)) when CLNT420_INTERNAL_LIMIT<>0 then cast(CLNT420_INTERNAL_LIMIT*100 as decimal(13,0)) else cast((select COFF420_INTERNAL_LIMIT*100 from :1/COFF where COFF_ADMNO = CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and COFF_CLNTNO = CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO and COFF_CODE = 'BE') as decimal(13,0)) end as "AMTCRD_CUR(Authorized)",
--(53)"AMTCRD_CUR(USED)" --############### ( select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALINVESTMENT)*100 as decimal(13,0)) from :1/CMON join :1/CLNT CLNTINVST on CMON_ADMNO=CLNTINVST.CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO=CLNTINVST.CLNT102_CLNTNO where CLNTINVST.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO=CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO and CLNTINVST.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO=CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO and CMON_YEAR=:2 and CMON_MONTH=:3 and CMON_CURRENCY=CLNT.CLNT108_ACC_CURR) as "AMTCRD_CUR(USED)",
--(54)"AMTCRD_PRC" (for both Authorized and Used) --############### cast('2' as char(1)) as "AMTCRD_PRC"
from :1/CLNT CLNT
left join :1/SECR on SECR_ADMNO=CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and SECR_CLNTNO=CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO
left join :1/CLIC on CLIC908_ADMNO=CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and CLIC908_CLNTNO=CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLIC908_INFS_CODE='BE'
left join :1/RISK on RISK_RATING=left(trim(CLNT.CLNT804_RISKRATING),4)
WHERE CLNT.CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT in (1,3,4,5) and CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO>3 and CLNT114_COUNTRY='BE' and CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO=3 and (CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO=CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO and CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO=CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO or CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO=0 or CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO<>3) and --(53)"AMTCRD_CUR(USED)" investment should be bigger than 1 --############### ( select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALINVESTMENT)*100 as decimal(13,0)) from :1/CMON join :1/CLNT CLNTINVST on CMON_ADMNO=CLNTINVST.CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO=CLNTINVST.CLNT102_CLNTNO where CLNTINVST.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO=CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO and CLNTINVST.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO=CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO and CMON_YEAR=:2 and CMON_MONTH=:3 and CMON_CURRENCY=CLNT.CLNT108_ACC_CURR ) >1 and CLNT.CLNT804_TYPEOFINVESTMENT=1 and CLNT.CLNT401_FINANCECONTRACT='Y' and CLIC908_ID is not null

Text.val: Only on first record : write header
Only on first record and only for full report
For every record
For every record, but only for full report.
by COMFIN we have for every debtor(client) always 2 credit rows:
one for Authorized credit and one for Used credit
sum amount for TRAILER
